name: Smash O’ Scope
description:
Game is controlled with mouse left-click button.

Smash O' Scope - Videogame where you handle oscilloscope and use oscilloscope's wave to eliminate hostile creatures within the screen.

This oscilloscope seems cursed! There are hostile creatures crawling from top to bottom of screen and you need to stop them with aligning oscilloscope's wave on creatures before they reach the bottom! 
 

This game was created during two (2) months Project Course in Game Development course.

Credits listed in credits.txt file that you can find at same folder where SmashOscope.exe file is.
